meaningMnemonic: You've got an <kanji>escape</kanji>d <kanji>letter</kanji>, in other words, an <vocabulary>omitted character</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>omitted letter</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
